sqlMessage: In aggregated query without GROUP BY, expression #1 of SELECT list contains nonaggregated column 'ds_public.ds_module_table.did'; this is incompatible with sql_mode=only_full_group_by
sql:
select ds_module_table.did as ds_module_table_did,ds_module_table.ds_left_did as ds_module_table_ds_left_did,ds_module_table.ds_right_did as ds_module_table_ds_right_did,ds_module_table.ds_update_time as ds_module_table_ds_update_time,ds_module_table.ds_create_time as ds_module_table_ds_create_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module.did) as ds_module_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module.ds_key) as ds_module_ds_key, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module.ds_name) as ds_module_ds_name, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module.ds_type) as ds_module_ds_type, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module.ds_dec) as ds_module_ds_dec, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module.ds_update_time) as ds_module_ds_update_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_module.ds_create_time) as ds_module_ds_create_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table.did) as ds_table_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table.ds_key) as ds_table_ds_key, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table.ds_name) as ds_table_ds_name, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table.ds_type) as ds_table_ds_type, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table.ds_dec) as ds_table_ds_dec, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table.ds_update_time) as ds_table_ds_update_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_table.ds_create_time) as ds_table_ds_create_time
                                    from ds_module_table
                                    left join ds_module on ds_module.did=ds_module_table.ds_left_did  left join ds_table on ds_table.did=ds_module_table.ds_right_did  left join ds_table_field on ds_table_field.ds_left_did=ds_table.did
